segments.text: I observe the woman at the sink, her dress neat and apron tied.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying that plate, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But water is spilling everywhere from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and her shoe is wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It must be slippery, and she could fall any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a beautiful garden view, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the path, everything looks well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the upper cabinets are open, cookie jar in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is stretched out on an unstable stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's at risk of tumbling down with that tilt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, arm raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're cooperating in this little mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to think of the accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes on the counter could shatter if there's a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic bliss is hiding so much danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
